entry.title: Learn You a PyTorch!
entry.summary:
Description

Have a basic understanding of machine learning, but have yet to build a neural network / want to build neural networks faster? Don’t sweat it, Learn You a PyTorch is here! Whether you’re using machine learning in production, or for your own pet projects, PyTorch is a great choice to be considered.

This talk will consist of the features PyTorch has to offer, and if time permits, a live coding of the MNIST classification task using PyTorch.
